Package server

Interface Summary
DatabaseHandler The DatabaseHandler interface provides generic interaction with a database of undefined type.
 

Class Summary
ClientHandler A ClientHandler deals with incoming service requests to the server.
FileDatabaseHandler The FileDatabaseHandler class allows a user to interface with an AddressBook of GuestInfo records stored in a data file.
GuestBookServer A GuestBookServer is a threaded application.
RealDatabaseHandler The RealDatabaseHandler class allows a user to interface with an Oracle database containg GuestInfo records.
ServerGUI The ServerGUI provides a graphical user interface for interacting with a GuestBookServer.
